title: Hospital & Doctor Consultation Platform
description: A scalable MERN-based healthcare system enabling doctor–patient consultations, appointment scheduling, admin workflows, and performance-optimized APIs.

title: Multimedia Mobile Application
description: A cross-platform React Native app supporting multimedia content with optimized file handling, smooth performance, and scalable backend integration.

title: Philippines Government Service Mobile App
description: A government service mobile application for the Philippines, currently under active development, built using Cordova with a focus on accessibility, reliability, and secure public service delivery.

title: Mentoring Management System
description: A full MERN stack academic mentoring system migrated from legacy PHP to improve scalability, performance, and mentor–student interaction.

title: Office Party Fun Game Platform
description: A fun, interactive MERN stack web platform designed for office party competitions. It hosts multiple mini-games for team and group play, includes live score tracking, real-time participation, and leaderboards to boost engagement during corporate events.

title: Tippen Ads Publishing Project
description: A lightweight web application built for office training and internal promotions. The platform allows users to upload, view, and manage short video advertisements in an Instagram-like vertical feed. Designed for publishing mock ads and training content, it supports smooth video playback, simple interactions, and structured content delivery using a REST API architecture.

title: Sling – Bulk Recharge Platform
description: Sling is a three-domain enterprise bulk recharge platform that allows companies to upload employee mobile numbers in bulk and process recharges efficiently. The system supports large-scale recharge operations with secure API integration and streamlined workflows. I worked as a Frontend Developer and Backend Support Engineer, contributing to UI development, REST API integration, and backend operational support.

title: Aaiwa Service Based Application
description: Aaiwa is a service-based platform supporting 40,000+ active users, where I led backend architecture and optimized REST APIs to remove performance blockers and improve request flow. Built a highly configurable Perfex CRM admin panel with template-level homepage control, spin-wheel notifications (OneSignal), and slot-based coupons, scaling users from 30,000 to 40,000+.
